Title: Parks
Description:
This map shows the number of parks within a 10-kilometer radius, based on data sourced from OpenStreetMap as of 2023.

The map reveals that parks are less common in the southern regions of Ukraine. Furthermore, regional centers do not necessarily have a higher concentration of parks compared to other cities. Exceptions include Lviv, Cherkasy, Odesa, Ivano-Frankivsk, Chernivtsi, Poltava, and Chernihiv. Notably, Kamianets-Podilskyi has the highest park density in Ukraine.
